name: object_detection
template: urisourcebin uri="{source[uri]}" ! tee name=t ! queue ! decodebin ! video/x-raw ! videoconvert name="videoconvert" ! queue ! gvadetect inference-id=inf0 model="{models[object_detection][1][network]}" model-proc="{models[object_detection][1][proc]}" name="detection" ! gvametaconvert converter=json method=detection source="{source[uri]}" name="jsonmetaconvert" ! gvametapublish method="mqtt" clientid=vaservice timeout=1000 address=127.0.0.1:1883 topic=vaservice ! queue ! appsink name=appsink t. ! queue ! parsebin ! splitmuxsink location={parameters[recording_prefix]} max-size-time=10000000000 max-size-bytes=1000000 name="record"
